summary:
9. Requests UNOCI to work closely with UN missions in Sierra Leone and Liberia.

10. Emphasizes mainstreaming gender perspective in peacekeeping.

11. Welcomes efforts to prevent sexual exploitation and abuse.

12. Authorizes French forces to support UNOCI:
    - Contribute to general security
    - Intervene at UNOCI's request
    - Intervene against belligerent actions
    - Protect civilians
    - Monitor arms embargo

13. Remains seized of the matter.
